string.description: Lets the user know that the time unit being changed is hour. Appears on the top of the TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=8]
string.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_hour

string.description: Lets the user know that the time unit being changed is minute. Appears on the top of the TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=8]
string.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_minute

string.description: Lets the user know that the time unit being changed is second. Appears on the top of the TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=8]
string.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_second

plurals.description: Content description of the current number of hours being selected in TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
plurals.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_hours_content_description

plurals.description: Content description of the current number of hours being selected in TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
plurals.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_minutes_content_description

plurals.description: Content description of the current number of hours being selected in TimePicker component. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
plurals.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_seconds_content_description

string.description: Content description of the period picker in TimePickerWith12HourClock. It lets the user select the period for 12H time format. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: wear_m3c_time_picker_period

string.description: Content description of the confirm button of DatePicker and TimePicker components. It lets the user confirm the date or time selected. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: wear_m3c_picker_confirm_button_content_description
